title: Caffeine-induced cardiac arrhythmia: an unrecognised danger of healthfood products.
abst: We describe a 25-year-old woman with pre-existing mitral valve prolapse who developed intractable ventricular fibrillation after consuming a "natural energy" guarana health drink containing a high concentration of caffeine. This case highlights the need for adequate labelling and regulation of such products.
title_plus_abst: Caffeine-induced cardiac arrhythmia: an unrecognised danger of healthfood products. We describe a 25-year-old woman with pre-existing mitral valve prolapse who developed intractable ventricular fibrillation after consuming a "natural energy" guarana health drink containing a high concentration of caffeine. This case highlights the need for adequate labelling and regulation of such products.
split_sentence: Caffeine-induced cardiac arrhythmia: an unrecognised danger of healthfood products.

We describe a 25-year-old woman with pre-existing mitral valve prolapse who developed intractable ventricular fibrillation after consuming a "natural energy" guarana health drink containing a high concentration of caffeine.
This case highlights the need for adequate labelling and regulation of such products.
